United Republicans (, RU) is a political party from Argentina, founded on November 9, 2020, with its main representative being Deputy Ricardo L贸pez Murphy. The party has definitive legal status in the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Province of C贸rdoba, and in the Province of Tierra del Fuego, in addition to having the provisional one in the province of Corrientes and in the Province of Buenos Aires.
It is a member of Together for Change in the provinces of Buenos Aires, C贸rdoba and Mendoza, while in Tierra del Fuego, Antarctica and the South Atlantic Islands it is part of the La Libertad Avanza front.
The party participated for the first time in the 2021 legislative elections.
